attributes.action: Full 2 weeks lockdown instead of faffing around with opening and closing stuff.
attributes.additional_details: WE ARE TIRED OF THIS! We are going around in circles with one thing being open and another closed. The virus will keep spreading if this faffing around continues. Let us sit at home for a full two weeks and then we can resume our lives as normal. Not everybody is mentally stable enough for this to continue with the back the forth.
attributes.background: We want a full two week lockdown with nothing open, no trains running etc only NHS to be open. Provided funding for NHS to transport their staff by car to and from work. No supermarkets nothing. Let everyone buy their groceries and shut shop for 2 weeks.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553156
